description: This file defines API routes for managing reminders within a trip management backend using FastAPI. It includes CRUD operations for reminders, schemas for request/response models, and utility functions for database lookups, all scoped under the /api/trips/{trip_id}/reminders endpoint.

classes.name: ReminderUpdate
classes.description: Schema for updating a reminder, allowing partial update of message and remind_at fields.

classes.name: ReminderListResponse
classes.description: Response schema for paginated list of reminders.

methods.name: Trip _get_trip_or_404(db: Session, trip_id: uuid.UUID)
methods.description: Fetches a trip by its UUID or raises a 404 HTTPException if not found.

methods.name: Reminder _get_reminder_or_404(db: Session, trip_id: uuid.UUID, reminder_id: uuid.UUID)
methods.description: Fetches a reminder scoped to a trip by its UUID or raises a 404 HTTPException.

methods.name: ReminderRead create_reminder( trip_id: uuid.UUID, payload: ReminderCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
Response delete_reminder( trip_id: uuid.UUID, reminder_id: uuid.UUID, db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
ReminderRead get_reminder( trip_id: uuid.UUID, reminder_id: uuid.UUID, db: Session = Depends(get_db), )

ReminderListResponse list_reminders( trip_id: uuid.UUID, db: Session = Depends(get_db), limit: int = Query(50, ge=1, le=100, description="Maximum number of reminders to return"), offset: int = Query(0, ge=0, description="Number of reminders to skip"), )
ReminderRead update_reminder( trip_id: uuid.UUID, reminder_id: uuid.UUID, payload: ReminderUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
